document_data.name: Flandarr Roaryl
document_data.mainbody: '''Flandarr Roaryl''' was one of the princes of [[Eskorn]], [[Laerakond]], as of [[1479 DR]]. He was a member of the  [[Clan Roaryl|Roaryl]] dynasty.
document_data.Background: In 1479 DR, Prince Flandarr plotted to become the next king of Eskorn, with the backing of King [[Ornan Roaryl]]'s most trusted spies and members of the [[Storm Rune]] merchant guild.
document_data.Relationships: Prince Flandarr was the second son of King Ornan Roaryl, and the brother of [[Imrar Roaryl|Imrar]] and [[Dlorna Roaryl]].
